description: Fetch the relay resource and it's attributes.

nested_items.name: Authentication
nested_items.description: The authentication attribute--contains the secret ARN where the customer relay server credentials are stored.

nested_items.name: NoAuthentication
nested_items.description: Keep an empty structure if the relay destination server does not require SMTP credential authentication.

nested_items.name: SecretArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the secret created in secrets manager where the relay server's SMTP credentials are stored.

nested_items.name: CreatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the relay was created.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when relay was last updated.

nested_items.name: RelayArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the relay.

nested_items.name: RelayName
nested_items.description: The unique name of the relay.
